item.title: Celebrancy Fees
item.description: Fees Birth celebrant fees Fee by negotiation, depending on your needs. Life celebrant fees Fee by negotiation, depending on your needs. Marriage celebrant fees The base fee for my marriage celebrancy is $350 (including GST). This fee could increase if you require additional services. Funeral celebrant fees The base fee for my funeral celebrancy is $350 (including GST). This fee could increase if you require additional services. Sidebar: Testimonials I can highly recommend Llew as a funeral celebrant for anyone who wants a service filled with dignity and that personal touch which helps make the day a memorable one for family and friends (read full testimonial).

item.title: Funeral Celebrancy
item.description: Funeral Celebrancy Lew King CelebrantWe humans are wired to be relational beings who are closely connected to family & friends. When a loved-one passes away we feel the pain deep with-in us. At the time it feels unreal, even surreal – we need someone to give us the advice we need for all that is taking place & needs to take place, for example : Pre-funeral advice Planning the funeral Conducting the funeral Post-funeral help Please contact me if you require Funeral Celebrant services.

item.title: Testimonials
item.description: Testimonial I can highly recommend Llew as a funeral celebrant for anyone who wants a service filled with dignity and that personal touch which helps make the day a memorable one for family and friends. Llew is a helpful and compassionate person, He can facilitate a simple, no fuss service to a more contemporary celebration of a life with, or without, spiritual content. He is professional in his approach, being there at all stages of the planning, helping people to relax, guiding them through the service, incorporating the ideas and wishes of the family, and making suggestions from his years of experience.

item.title: Contact
item.description: NEED TO ADD A FORM Please contact me if you wish to further discuss your requirements. If your enquiry is urgent, please contact me on : 027 435 7009. Alternatively, email me at : LLEW@celebrancyforlife.co.nz
